media:group.media:title: Radiohead - Follow Me Around (Official Video)
media:group.media:description:
‘Follow Me Around’ is taken from ‘KID A MNESIA’ out via XL Recordings. 

Buy and stream KID A MNESIA: https://radiohead.ffm.to/kid-a-mnesia 
Explore the KID A MNESIA exhibition and gift shop: https://kida-mnesia.com

Directors: Us 
Starring Guy Pearce
